title: Enchanting Emerald and Pearl Guttapusalu Haaram with Peacock Pendant
materials: Diamond-cut stones; Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Traditional Guttapusalu design featuring cascading emerald beads, complemented by a modern peacock pendant adorned with blue gemstone. Intricate detailing with pearl accents and diamond-cut stones enhances the design. The pendant features a unique 'Jhumka' style drop at the bottom with pearls and emeralds. Features floral attachments with rice pearls on either side of the pendant.
occasions: and other special occasions. The piece would be an excellent choice for Muhurtham
description: This Haaram is a unique blend of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The high-quality emeralds and pearls exude luxury, while the intricate peacock pendant adds a touch of modern elegance. The lustrous Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting beauty. The use of rice pearls signifies prosperity and blessings. This piece is a statement of timeless beauty.
